title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7334.5 - Restrictions on correspondence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7334.5 - Restrictions on correspondence

State Regulations

Nothing contained in this Part shall be deemed to prevent
the director, or designee, from establishing a list of correspondents with whom
youth shall be prohibited from corresponding in order to protect the safety, security, or operational stability of the facility, or the safety, security, or
the health of a person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7334.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
